titleStmt.title: Severall sermons of Robert Harris once of Hanwell, now president of Trinity College in Oxon, and Doctor of Divinity being a supplement to his works formerly printed in folio ... / by Robert Harris ...
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher for John Bartlet the elder, and John Bartlet the younger ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
